# coordinate

**Instance Property**

The geographical coordinate information.

## Declaration

```swift
var coordinate: CLLocationCoordinate2D { get }
```

## Getting the location

- **horizontalAccuracy**: The horizontal accuracy (in meters) of the specified coordinate.
